channel.title: How do i make pk zones?
channel.description:
how do i make pk zones? and where to add
because i couldnt find a tutroial about it
i did found a tutorial about safe zones but not a good one about pk zones
i maked the full world safe zone but i wanted to make it full safe with wildy pk but that didnt workd i dont know how but it just didnt workd
know i need a tutorial about how i make something a pk area?
any help?

item.title: How do i make pk zones?
item.dc:creator: @liamsford liamsford
item.description:
@liamsford wrote:

[quote=“gh0styscape, post:2, topic:63720”]download testscape , pking only in wilderness and safe everywere else.[/quote]Thats NOT what he’s asking.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make pk zones?

item.title: How do i make pk zones?
item.dc:creator: @bloempot99 bloempot99
item.description:
@bloempot99 wrote:

it was full pk (-_-) but dont want to make like 50 safe zones

because im getting alot of things like cw and that sort of stuff and it would be easyer if i just make 1 pk area than 50 safe zones dont u think?

[br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2007, 12:30:54 PM[/size][hr]well no one is replying on that tutorial and i dont get the toturial from him

could u explain

where to add the coords from the pk area?

public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; } } public void checkwildy2() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514)) { inwildy2 = false; } else { inwildy2 = true; } }

but i dont get the tutorial

so maybe like this?

if i want this coords would be a pk area 2000 2000 2000 2000 it would be like this?

public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 2900 && absY >= 2000) || (absY <= 2000)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; public void checkwildy2() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514)) { inwildy2 = false; } else { inwildy2 = true; }

i just dont get the tutorial (-_-)

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make pk zones?
item.dc:creator: @bloempot99 bloempot99
item.description:
@bloempot99 wrote:

dude im really far in my phonescape based server

i got fletching working
firemaking working
smithing working
farming working
runecraft working
crafting working
thieving working
mining 50% done

lots of objects added

im not gonna start all over again

so could someone plz help me fixing so the wildy is just pk and the rest is safe zone

because now everything is safe zone, the wildy is also safe zone but the wildy must be pk
any help?
